targets.expr:
avg without(ceph_daemon,instance,pod) (ceph_bluestore_onode_hits{}) / 
(
  avg without(ceph_daemon,instance,pod) (ceph_bluestore_onode_hits{}) +
  avg without(ceph_daemon,instance,pod) (ceph_bluestore_onode_misses{})
)
count without (instance, ceph_daemon) (ceph_osd_up{}) - count without (instance, ceph_daemon) (ceph_osd_in{})

panels.description: Dropped noisy virtual devices for readability.
panels.title: Global Network Utilization by device
